alert.note: Alert for Clay; Geary; Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 9:59PM CDT until July 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Geary County in east central Kansas... Southern Riley County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Pottawatomie County in northeastern Kansas... Southeastern Clay County in north central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Riley, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Clay Center, Ogden, Wakefield, Riley, Milford, Leonardville and Keats. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 304 and 313. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
